title: Updated Chic Community! High End Finishes!
posting_body: We believe the perfect apartment home should delight residents with a variety of exclusive amenities.

After all, who doesn’t enjoy a beach entry resort-style pool to swim or relax in, a convenient fitness center to unwind from a stressful day or inviting friends over to relax by the fire in our outdoor lounge?
Not to mention our Grand Prairie location is unsurpassed in outdoor activities.
Community Amenities...
Beach Entry Resort Style Swimming Pool
2 Fire Pits
Outdoor Fitness Area
Picnic Areas
Indoor and Outdoor Lounge Areas
Large Dog Park
Multiple Grilling Stations
2.7 Acre Private Pond with Walking Paths
Smoke Free Community
Fully Gated Community
Computer Center and Conference Room
Exercise Studio with WiFi Enabled Cardio Equipment, Weight Training Machines and Flat Screen TV
Brushed Stainless or Chrome Hardware
Polished Concrete Floors (Phase II) - selected apartments
Gourmet Kitchens with Granite Counters and Island
Designer Cabinets with Pantry and Drawers Galore
Under Cabinet Lighting
Framed or Back Lite Mirror in Bath(s)
Linen, Coat Closet and Patio Storage
Walk in Closets
Wood Inspired Flooring - selected apartments
Close Access to Lynn Creek Marina at Joe Pool Lake
Near Cedar Hill State Park's 15 Miles of Trails or Hike Through the 1,200 Acres of Prime Mountain Landscape
Within Walking Distance to Joe Pool Lake.
Enjoy Lake Experience, Fishing and Boating
Please Call Desiree with DASH Realty
